name: c4-plan
description: Discovery → Design → Task creation. Full structured plan for a feature.

name: c4-run
description: Spawn workers for all pending tasks in parallel.

name: c4-finish
description: Build → test → install → docs → commit. Post-implementation routine.

name: c4-status
description: Visual task graph progress with queue summary and worker status.

name: c4-quick
description: Create + assign one task immediately, skip planning phase.

name: c4-polish
description: Build-test-review-fix loop until reviewer finds zero changes.

name: c4-refine
description: Iterative review-fix loop using isolated worker context.

name: c4-checkpoint
description: Phase gate review: approve, request-changes, replan, or redesign.

name: c4-validate
description: Run lint + unit tests. Severity-based: CRITICAL blocks commit.

name: c4-add-task
description: Add new task interactively with DoD and scope guidance.

name: c4-submit
description: Submit completed task with automated validation.

name: c4-standby
description: Convert session into a persistent C5 Hub worker.

name: c4-swarm
description: Spawn coordinator-led agent team for parallel C4 tasks.

name: c4-stop
description: Stop execution, transition to HALTED state.

name: c4-help
description: Quick reference for skills, agents, and MCP tools.
